rationale: The segment contains low-risk descriptors ('found no other cases', 'No other cases... have been reported') but not an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Investigation of his close contacts found no other cases, the NHC said. No other cases of human infection with H10N3 have been reported globally, it [the NHC] added.
